## EthersMosaicStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EthersMosaicStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledMosaicStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledmosaicstore.md) will be created.
